Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_neyfjiVuRe1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Y_gd16_bi74" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>WhyBeAre</strong> hasn’t played KSP in a while. When he came back to it, he was overwhelmed by how much there was to do. How does it feel coming back to a game that’s changed so much while you were away? Watch and find out.</p>
Cool! I was totally expecting him to blow up.
WhyBeAre is one of my favorite youtubers! I watched him for over a month already and I am suprised he gets mentioned by the ksp devs.
